# How to Watch Krazzy 4 Full Movie in HD Online
 
If you are looking for a comedy movie that will make you laugh out loud, then you should check out Krazzy 4. This is a 2008 Bollywood film that features four mentally challenged men who embark on a hilarious adventure. The movie stars Rajpal Yadav, Arshad Warsi, Irrfan Khan, and Suresh Menon as the four protagonists, along with Juhi Chawla, Dia Mirza, and Rakhi Sawant in supporting roles.
 
Krazzy 4 is a fun-filled movie that will keep you entertained from start to finish. The movie has a lot of funny scenes and dialogues that will make you crack up. The movie also has some special appearances by Shah Rukh Khan, Hrithik Roshan, and Abhishek Bachchan, who perform some catchy songs and dances.
